summary: The criminal exploits of Public Enemy number 1, George 'Machine-Gun' Kelly, during the 1930s.
cast: Charles Bronson|Susan Cabot|Morey Amsterdam|Richard Devon|Jack Lambert|Frank DeKova|Connie Gilchrist|Wally Campo|Barboura Morris|Lori Martin|George Archambeault|Robert Griffin|Michael Fox|Larry Thor|Shirley Falls|Dwight Brooks|Gene Corman|J. Edgar Hoover|Mitzi McCall|Jay Sayer|Ted Thorpe
title: La ley de las armas
